name: jobswipe-web
buildCommand: cd ../.. && pnpm --filter @jobswipe/database run db:generate && pnpm --filter @jobswipe/shared build && pnpm --filter @jobswipe/database build && pnpm --filter @jobswipe/web build
installCommand: npm install -g pnpm@9.0.0 && cd ../.. && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --include-workspace-root
